      our menu

      The Viking

      Homemade tomato sauce, mozzarella, pepperoni, black olives, and pineapple, garnished with basil. Fit for a Viking!

      The Margarita Matthew

      Just sauce and cheese. It's that simple!

      The Perfect Pesto

      Canadian bacon, pesto, red pepper, carmalized onions, and olives.

      The Hawiian

      Canadian bacon, mozzarella, and pineapple.

      Homemande Foccia

      Our signature hors d'oeuvre with olive oil, rosemary, and a hint of sea salt.

      Build Your Own Pizza

      You name the topping, we probably have it. Get creative!
